mutants.code:
def smallest_alphanumeric(arr):
    alphanumeric_arr = [str(i) for i in arr if str(i).isalnum()]
    alphanumeric_arr.sort()
    return alphanumeric_arr[1]

def smallest_alphanumeric(arr):
    alphanumeric_arr = [str(i) for i in arr if str(i).isalnum()]
    alphanumeric_arr.sort()
    return alphanumeric_arr[-1]

    return alphanumeric_arr[1]
